name: over-syncerr
description: Overr-Syncerr is a self-hosted automation tool for syncing Plex media libraries by matching and updating content metadata and watched status across instances.
features: Library synchronization: Keep multiple Plex servers in sync by copying library structure and content organization.
Watched status sync: Transfer viewing progress and watched markers between Plex instances for consistent experience.
Metadata matching: Align movie and TV show metadata across libraries to ensure accurate content identification.
Automated updates: Run sync operations on a schedule to maintain consistency without manual intervention.
Selective sync: Choose specific libraries or content types to synchronize while excluding others.
Conflict resolution: Handle duplicate content and metadata conflicts with configurable merge strategies.
Multi-server support: Manage synchronization between more than two Plex servers from a central configuration.
Dry run mode: Preview sync operations before executing to verify changes and prevent unintended modifications.
